name: Infuse HA Starter Kit - Mixed Berry

breadcrumbs.name: Infuse HA Starter Kit - Mixed Berry

images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/2023 - Product Profile - Spanish - Infuse Folding Broch.jpg
description:
This Infuse HA Starter Kit gets you everything you need to introduce you to Infuse HA! By purchasing this starter kit, you receive

30-Day Supply of Mixed Berry Infuse HA
10-Day Trial Size of unflavored Infuse HA
Air Tight Branded Glass Jar + Bamboo Lid
Society Scoop

Purchasing this Starter Kit automatically enrolls you in a monthly subscription for Mixed Berry Infuse HA

Infuse HA is a potent inner skin treatment that fights oxidative stress and minimizes visible signs of aging. Formulated with HaPlex Plus, this unflavored water charger moisturizes skin from within while improving elasticity. In clinical studies, this ultra-pure form of sodium hyaluronate improved skin moisture by 9% within 45 days. After 180 days, skin elasticity increased by 11%. This easy-to-use powder can also help lower superoxide dismutase and oxidative stress levels (MDA), decreasing the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles, sunspots, and other signs of aging.

1-180g pouch provides a 30-day supply of Infuse HA
descriptionHtml:
This Infuse HA Starter Kit gets you everything you need to introduce you to Infuse HA! By purchasing this starter kit, you receive

  • 30-Day Supply of Mixed Berry Infuse HA
  • 10-Day Trial Size of unflavored Infuse HA
  • Air Tight Branded Glass Jar + Bamboo Lid
  • Society Scoop

Purchasing this Starter Kit automatically enrolls you in a monthly subscription for Mixed Berry Infuse HA

name: Keep It Light Refill
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Keep It Light.jpg
https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/2023 - Product Profile - Spanish - Keep It Light.jpg
description:
Refills are meant to refill the beautiful bottles of products you already love! With that being said, all refills are non-refundable

WATER, OCTYLDODECANOL, CETYL CAPRYLATE, GLYCERIN, PANTHENOL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, MALVA SYLVESTRIS (MALLOW) FLOWER EXTRACT, HEDERA HELIX (IVY) LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, CUCUMIS SATIVUS (CUCUMBER) FRUIT EXTRACT, SAMBUCUS NIGRA FLOWER EXTRACT, ARNICA MONTANA FLOWER EXTRACT, ANACYCLUS PYRETHRUM ROOT EXTRACT, PHOSPHOLIPIDS, CYCLOPENTASILOXANE, DIMETHICONE, HYDROXYPROPYL METHYLCELLULOSE, ACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYDIMETHYLTAURATE COPOLYMER, SQUALENE, POLYSORBATE 60, LAURETH-4, POLYSORBATE 80, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, FARSENOL, LINALOOL, POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE, POTASSIUM SORBATE, METHYLISOTHIAZOLINONE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, DISODIUM EDTA.

Keep It Light is an ultra-hydrating, oil-free crème-gel moisturizer that uses Moisturezomes to hydrate skin at the deepest level. This formula is designed to plump and smooth skin for a refreshed look from the very first use. Enriched with sodium hyaluronate and provitamin B, this gel helps deliver moisture to individual skin cells for greater hydration. Keep It Light reprograms skin to retain moisture for longer without clogging pores, making it a go-to crème for individuals who have oily or blemish-prone skin.

1.35 fl. oz. bottle
descriptionHtml:
Refills are meant to refill the beautiful bottles of products you already love! With that being said, all refills are non-refundable

name: Anytime Anywhere Refill
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Anytime Anywhere.jpg
description: Anytime Anywhere is a time-released smart moisturizer that fights the signs of aging both day and night. Formulated to support the body's natural lipids, this lotion hydrates and soothes skin at a deep level. Antioxidant vitamins A, C, and E promote radiance and fight the visible signs of aging. Farnesol restores balance to oily skin within 15 days and to dry skin within 45 days for a healthy, hydrated complexion. This moisturizer balances skin by restoring an ideal water-to-oil ratio.
descriptionHtml: Anytime Anywhere is a time-released smart moisturizer that fights the signs of aging both day and night. Formulated to support the body's natural lipids, this lotion hydrates and soothes skin at a deep level. Antioxidant vitamins A, C, and E promote radiance and fight the visible signs of aging. Farnesol restores balance to oily skin within 15 days and to dry skin within 45 days for a healthy, hydrated complexion. This moisturizer balances skin by restoring an ideal water-to-oil ratio.

name: Rose Quartz Roller
description: This Rose Quartz Roller stimulates the lymphatic system to eliminate toxins under the eyes, all over your face, jawline, and neck to even out skin tone and more. With continued use, this Rose Quartz Roller will help alleviate the appearance of puffiness, fine lines, and tired skin. Follow instructions on the back of your roller’s box, use the roller with your Step 3 or Step 4 products for deeper product penetration!
descriptionHtml: This Rose Quartz Roller stimulates the lymphatic system to eliminate toxins under the eyes, all over your face, jawline, and neck to even out skin tone and more. With continued use, this Rose Quartz Roller will help alleviate the appearance of puffiness, fine lines, and tired skin. Follow instructions on the back of your roller’s box, use the roller with your Step 3 or Step 4 products for deeper product penetration!

name: Polished - Blueberry Stem Cell Gel Moisturizer

breadcrumbs.name: Polished - Blueberry Stem Cell Gel Moisturizer

images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Polished.jpg
description:
Polished is a lightweight gel moisturizer formulated to calm, protect, and hydrate skin all day long. Infused with soothing compounds such as marshmallow extract and lavender oil, this gel reduces inflammation to leave skin looking and feeling healthier. Polished is packed with tropical butters and oils that hydrate deeply while protecting the skin's natural moisture barrier. This lightweight gel absorbs quickly and won't clog pores or leave skin greasy. Polished is the perfect everyday moisturizer for individuals who want soft, supple skin without the heavy feel of a traditional moisturizing cream.

3.53 oz. jar
descriptionHtml:
Polished is a lightweight gel moisturizer formulated to calm, protect, and hydrate skin all day long. Infused with soothing compounds such as marshmallow extract and lavender oil, this gel reduces inflammation to leave skin looking and feeling healthier. Polished is packed with tropical butters and oils that hydrate deeply while protecting the skin's natural moisture barrier. This lightweight gel absorbs quickly and won't clog pores or leave skin greasy. Polished is the perfect everyday moisturizer for individuals who want soft, supple skin without the heavy feel of a traditional moisturizing cream.

3.53 oz. jar

name: Plot Twist Mascara
description: A good mascara is tough to find, and a fantastic mascara is virtually impossible to create. Our lab has put a lot of time and energy into creating this new mascara that checked all of our boxes! Plot Twist’s formula is super shiny, extremely long-lasting, and is made to resist clumping. Lengthen and thicken your lashes with our new state-of-the-art formula and effective rubber wand with only a few swipes! We are very proud of our latest creation, and we are confident that this product will be your new go-to.
descriptionHtml: A good mascara is tough to find, and a fantastic mascara is virtually impossible to create. Our lab has put a lot of time and energy into creating this new mascara that checked all of our boxes! Plot Twist’s formula is super shiny, extremely long-lasting, and is made to resist clumping. Lengthen and thicken your lashes with our new state-of-the-art formula and effective rubber wand with only a few swipes! We are very proud of our latest creation, and we are confident that this product will be your new go-to.

name: Love Thy Face Refill
images: https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/61603 Beauty Society Advisor Product Guide - Love Thy Face.jpg
https://beautysociety.blob.core.windows.net/images-prod/2023 - Product Profile - Spanish - Love Thy Face.jpg
description:
Refills are meant to refill the beautiful bottles of products you already love. With that being said, all refills are non-refundable

Love Thy Face harnesses the power of rosemary to rebuild lipid oils found deep in the skin, where the first signs of aging begin. This miracle moisturizer increases lipids by up to 450%, restoring the natural moisture barrier that protects skin from sun, pollution, and free-radical damage that causes fine lines, wrinkles, and skin discoloration. Soluble beta-glucans slow down antioxidant depletion that is particularly problematic for individuals with sensitive, dry, or chemically treated skin. Formulated with soothing compounds that fight redness and irritation, Love Thy Face is an anti-aging miracle designed for individuals with dry, sensitive, chemically treated, and maturing skin.

1.76 fl. oz. jar

Waste-reducing refill pouches are available.

name: BeautyBox Experience
description: Our BeautyBox Experience offers an exciting new way to start as a Society+ member AND a BeautyBox Subscriber without waiting for subscription day! For only $29 plus free shipping, this box acts as a sneak peek of what you will receive in your future BeautyBox subscriptions!
